ðŸ“– Summary: Abogen is a text-to-speech tool that converts EPUB, PDF, and text files into high-quality audiobooks with synchronized subtitles. It leverages the Kokoro-82M model for natural-sounding speech. The tool supports multiple platforms, including Windows, Linux, and macOS, offering flexible installation options.
